name: 2024 7th International Conference on Materials Design and Applications
content: ublication: Accepted and registered papers with presentation will be published in below listed journals of Scientific.Net collection. Defect and Diffusion Forum (DDF) (ISSN print 1012-0386 / ISSN web 1662-9507) Solid State Phenomena (SSP) (ISSN print 1012-0394 / ISSN web 1662-9779) Materials Science Forum (MSF) (ISSN print 0255-5476 / ISSN web 1662-9752) Key Engineering Materials (KEM) (ISSN print 1013-9826 / ISSN web 1662-9795)
